mapper.sql: id, category_name, category_icon, category_description, sort_order, article_count, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_category ( category_name, category_icon, category_description, sort_order, article_count, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{categoryName}, #{categoryIcon}, #{categoryDescription}, #{sortOrder}, 0, 1, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM blog_category ORDER BY sort_order ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT FROM blog_category WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC, create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_category SET article_count = article_count + #{increment}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE blog_category SET article_count = article_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{categoryId}
UPDATE blog_category SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
